entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
